name: Far From Home (Bojuka)
description:
Find your missing parents through out a scary adventure! What to expect

While playing this game, you'll find several obstacles in your way, being your main goal to go forward, as in a normal sidescroller. Fight enemies, find keys and some hidden locations to be able to experience this game in its fullest.

Information about the game

This game was made as a prototype for a game design curricular unit project, with the purpose of developing skills when it comes to, more specifically, level design. Its idea and mechanics have been discussed through out several weeks, finally coming now to a conclusion, by sharing Far From Home with all of you.

Controls

Use the key X to jump, Z to grab items, Space to drop them, and Enter to pause the game. You'll also be able to move by using the Left and Right arrow keys, and to crouch by using the Down arrow key.

Credits

Nuno Custódio

Marco Sousa

Alexandre Israel
